about_the_game:
TRAILCAM

Step into the shoes of a veterinarian investigator, specializing in forest and wildlife incidents. You’ve been summoned by the Appalachian Mountains Forest Agency to investigate a series of unsettling missing person reports. Every time someone vanishes, the forest is left with ominous traces— blood, signs of struggle —but no bodies are ever found.

The local police have hit a dead end, and now it’s up to you. Could the culprit be a massive predator, dragging its prey to an unknown lair, or is there something more sinister at play? As the sole expert on the case, your mission is to uncover the truth from a remote watchtower , deep in the heart of the Appalachian wilderness.

Using a sophisticated PC system connected to a network of trail cameras, you’ll monitor, document, and report any suspicious activity. As you dive deeper, prepare yourself for unexpected plot twists and a non-linear storyline that will keep you constantly on edge.

Are you ready to solve the mystery of TRAILCAM, or will you become the next person to disappear without a trace ...

---

Key Features

- Unique Investigation Gameplay: Use real-time footage from trail cameras to gather evidence and investigate suspicious occurrences.

- Thrilling Storyline: A mystery that keeps you guessing, full of twists and unexpected turns.

- Atmospheric Setting: Explore the eerie wilderness of the Appalachian Mountains from your isolated watchtower.

- Non-linear Narrative: Every choice and discovery affects the outcome of the case.

---

Are you brave enough to uncover the truth behind the missing persons, or will you be the next victim of the wilderness?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In TRAILCAM, you are a wildlife investigator called to the Appalachian Mountains to solve mysterious missing person cases. Using trail cameras from your watchtower, you’ll uncover a sinister truth, navigating a non-linear plot full of twists. Can you solve the mystery?
